{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.14924v1", "title": "Quantum Curves in the Context of Symplectic Duality", "summary": "We discuss how to use the recent progress in understanding of the $x$-$y$
duality and symplectic duality in the theory of topological recursion and its
generalizations in order to efficiently compute the quantum spectral curve
operators for the wave functions with arbitrary base points. The paper also
contains an overview of recent generalizations of the setup of topological
recursion prompted by the progress in understanding the $x$-$y$ duality.", "main_category": "math-ph", "categories": "math-ph,hep-th,math.AG,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-21T07:47:02Z"}
